alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:20PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT AREAS NORTH OF PAYSON AND NEAR WASHINGTON PARK THROUGH 445 PM MST... At 419 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Whispering Pines, or 8 miles northeast of Payson, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Payson, Star Valley, Flowing Springs, Mesa Del Caballo, Geronimo Estates, Freedom Acres, Washington Park, Whispering Pines, Mead Ranch, Geronimo Boy Scout Camp, Water Wheel Burn At Houston Mesa Rd- S, Beaver Valley, Water Wheel Burn At Houston Mesa Rd- N, and Kehl Springs Campground. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 255 and 258. State Route 87 between mile markers 259 and 260. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County
